document.full_text: first he ran from the star whackers. now randy quaid has taken to a vancouver concert stage to blast them in song with his backup band, the fugitives.
document.title: randy quaid performs "star whackers" song
lines_and_colors: first he ran from the star whackers. now randy quaid has taken to a vancouver concert stage to blast them in song with his backup band, the fugitives.
